text: aur tum usake laane mein (khuda ko) aajiz nahin kar sakate (ai rasool tum unase) kaho ki ai meree qaum tum bajae khud jo chaaho karo main (bajae khud) amal kar raha hoon phir anaqareeb tumhen maaloom ho jaega ki aakherat (behasht) kisake lie hai (tumhaare lie ya hamaare lie) zaalim log to haragiz kaamayaab na honge
